description: Ethereal 0.9.0 through 0.10.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a certain malformed SMB packet.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1142

description: The password generation in mailman before 2.1.5 generates only 5 million unique passwords, which makes it easier for remote attackers to guess passwords via a brute force attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1143

description: Unknown vulnerability in the 32bit emulation code in Linux 2.4 on AMD64 systems allows local users to gain privileges.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1144

description: Multiple vulnerabilities in Konqueror in KDE 3.3.1 and earlier (1) allow access to restricted Java classes via JavaScript and (2) do not properly restrict access to certain Java classes from the Java applet, which allows remote attackers to bypass sandbox restrictions and read or write arbitrary files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1145

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in (1) main.c and (2) login.c for CVSTrac before 1.1.5 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML and web script.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1146

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the in_cdda.dll plugin for Winamp 5.0 through 5.08c allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a cda:// URL with a long (1) device name or (2) sound track number, as demonstrated with a .m3u or .pls playlist file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1150

description: Internet Explorer 5.01 through 6 allows remote attackers to spoof arbitrary web sites by injecting content from one window into another window whose name is known but resides in a different domain, as demonstrated using a pop-up window on a trusted web site, aka the "window injection" vulnerability.  NOTE: later research shows that Internet Explorer 7 on Windows XP SP2 is also vulnerable.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1155

description: Mozilla before 1.7.6, and Firefox before 1.0.1, allows remote attackers to spoof arbitrary web sites by injecting content from one window into a target window whose name is known but resides in a different domain, as demonstrated using a pop-up window on a trusted web site, aka the "window injection" vulnerability.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1156

description: CRLF injection vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0.2800.1106 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary FTP commands via an ftp:// URL that contains a URL-encoded newline ("%0a") before the FTP command, which causes the commands to be inserted into the resulting FTP session, as demonstrated using a PORT command.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1166

description: Internet Explorer 6 allows remote attackers to bypass the popup blocker via the document object model (DOM) methods in the DHTML Dynamic HTML (DHTML) Editing Component (DEC) and Javascript that calls showModalDialog.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1173

description: The debstd script in debmake 3.6.x before 3.6.10 and 3.7.x before 3.7.7 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary directories.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1179

cpe:
*cpe:2.3:a:debian:debmake:3.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*
     *cpe:2.3:a:debian:debmake:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* versions up to (including) 3.6.9
     *cpe:2.3:a:debian:debmake:3.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*
     *cpe:2.3:a:debian:debmake:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* versions up to (including) 3.7.6

description: hfaxd in HylaFAX before 4.2.1, when installed with a "weak" hosts.hfaxd file, allows remote attackers to authenticate and bypass intended access restrictions via a crafted (1) username or (2) hostname that satisfies a regular expression that is matched against a hosts.hfaxd entry without a password.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1182

description: Multiple buffer overflows in enscript 1.6.3 allow remote attackers or local users to cause a denial of service (application crash).

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1186

description: The add_to_history function in svr_principal.c in libkadm5srv for MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) up to 1.3.5, when performing a password change, does not properly track the password policy's history count and the maximum number of keys, which can cause an array index out-of-bounds error and may allow authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a heap-based buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1189

description: Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash from memory consumption), as demonstrated using Javascript code that continuously creates nested arrays and then sorts the newly created arrays.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1198

description: Firefox and Mozilla allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash from memory consumption), as demonstrated using Javascript code that continuously creates nested arrays and then sorts the newly created arrays.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1200

description: load_elf_binary in Linux before 2.4.26 allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) via an ELF binary in which the interpreter is NULL.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1234

description: Buffer overflow in the LDAP component for Netscape Directory Server (NDS) 3.6 on HP-UX and other operating systems allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

description: The (1) eqn2graph and (2) pic2graph scripts in groff 1.18.1 allow local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1296

description: The Windows Animated Cursor (ANI) capability in Windows NT, Windows 2000 through SP4, Windows XP through SP1, and Windows 2003 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via (1) the frame number set to zero, which causes an invalid memory address to be used and leads to a kernel crash, or (2) the rate number set to zero, which leads to resource exhaustion and hang.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1305

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in winhlp32.exe in Windows NT, Windows 2000 through SP4, Windows XP through SP2, and Windows 2003 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .hlp file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1306

description: Integer overflow in the TIFFFetchStripThing function in tif_dirread.c for libtiff 3.6.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a TIFF file with the STRIPOFFSETS flag and a large number of strips, which causes a zero byte buffer to be allocated and leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1307

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in MSG_UnEscapeSearchUrl in nsNNTPProtocol.cpp for Mozilla 1.7.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via an NNTP URL (news:) with a trailing '\' (backslash) character, which prevents a string from being NULL terminated.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1316

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in doexec.c in Netcat for Windows 1.1, when running with the -e option, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long DNS command.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1317

description: The DHTML Edit Control (dhtmled.ocx) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script into other domains by setting a name for a window, opening a child page whose target is the window with the given name, then injecting the script from the parent into the child using execScript, as demonstrated by "AbusiveParent" in Internet Explorer 6.0.2900.2180.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1319

description: Asante FM2008 running firmware 1.06 is shipped with a default username and password, which could allow remote attackers to gain unauthorized access.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1320

description: The configuration backup in Asante FM2008 running firmware 1.06 stores the username and password in cleartext, which could allow remote attackers to gain unauthorized access.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1321

description: Cisco Unity 2.x, 3.x, and 4.x, when integrated with Microsoft Exchange, has several hard coded usernames and passwords, which allows remote attackers to gain unauthorized access and change configuration settings or read outgoing or incoming e-mail messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1322

description: Multiple syscalls in the compat subsystem for NetBSD before 2.0 allow local users to cause a denial of service (kernel crash) via a large signal number to (1) xxx_sys_kill, (2) xxx_sys_sigaction, and possibly other translation functions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1323

description: The Microsoft Windows Media Player 9.0 ActiveX control may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary web script in the Local computer zone via the (1) artist or (2) song fields of a music file, if the file is processed using Internet Explorer.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1324

description: The getItemInfoByAtom function in the ActiveX control for Microsoft Windows Media Player 9.0 returns a 0 if the file does not exist and the size of the file if the file exists, which allows remote attackers to determine the existence of files on the local system.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1325

description: Buffer overflow in dxterm in Ultrix 4.5 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via a long -setup parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1326

description: Unknown vulnerability in newgrp in HP-UX B.11.00, B.11.04, and B.11.11 allows local users to gain elevated privileges.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1329

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1330

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1333

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1334

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1335

description: The xdvizilla script in tetex-bin 2.0.2 creates temporary files with predictable file names, which allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1336

description: The POSIX Capability Linux Security Module (LSM) for Linux kernel 2.6 does not properly handle the credentials of a process that is launched before the module is loaded, which allows local users to gain privileges.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1337

description: The triggers in Oracle 9i and 10g allow local users to gain privileges by using a sequence of partially privileged actions: using CCBKAPPLROWTRIG or EXEC_CBK_FN_DML to add arbitrary functions to the SDO_CMT_DBK_FN_TABLE and SDO_CMT_CBK_DML_TABLE, then performing a DELETE on the SDO_TXN_IDX_INSERTS table, which causes the SDO_CMT_CBK_TRIG trigger to execute the user-supplied functions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1338

description: CVS 1.12 and earlier on Debian GNU/Linux does not properly handle when a mapping for the current repository does not exist in the cvs-repouids file, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (server crash).

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1374

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1377

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1382

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1383

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1384

description: Gadu-Gadu build 155 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a message that contains an image whose filename does not start with restricted characters.

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in Kayako eSupport 2.x allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the searchm parameter.

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPKontakt 3.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an e-mail address, which is not quoted when a parsing error is generated.
